items.sentence: Tom stopped laughing when he noticed Mary was crying.
Tom stopped what he was doing and answered his phone.
Tom suggested that we have a farewell party for Mary.
Tom suggested that we try doing this a different way.
Tom taught French in Boston before moving to Chicago.
Tom had almost forgotten all about what had happened.
Tom had enough money to buy everything he had to buy.
Tom had no intention of going to the dance with Mary.
Tom had to pawn his guitar in order to pay his bills.
Tom and Mary haven\'t spoken to each other for years.
